title: Riot Pls
body: I need ONE more orange essence for the skin that i need... can you give it to me? :(

replies.body:
I can't do much about essence here on the boards, but I know if you're a very small amount of RP away from something you should try hitting our agents up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) sometime! I'm not sure, but heck, they might even be able to help with essence at this point. No promises there, but it's worth a try!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
